alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 3:08PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 400 PM MST... At 306 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a couple strong thunderstorms, near Stanfield and west of Maricopa along SR 283. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Avondale, Goodyear, Maricopa, Estrella, Big Horn, Freeman, Estrella Sailport, Sonoran National Monument, Estrella Mountain Park, Estrella Mountain Ranch, Mobile, Rainbow Valley, Stanfield, and Ak- Chin Village. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 136 and 165. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 12 and 44. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 179. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; West Pinal County
